rod.welcome.7.title: About Multiblock Structures
rod.welcome.7.description0: &aAll multiblock structures have blueprints. You can find corresponding structures in the Blueprint Table and preview them in-world
rod.welcome.7.description1: &cPS: Do NOT &4&lshift+right-click&r&c on blueprints. We're not responsible for crashes
rod.welcome.8.title: About Custom Machines
rod.welcome.9.title: About World Type
rod.welcome.9.description0: &aI used LockdownReborn to lock world generation
rod.welcome.9.description1: &cIf the default generation isn't superflat, delete all files in the original world folder and copy-paste files from the template folder to the corresponding location

rod.c1.s1.5.description0: When automating the Fluid Crafting Table
rod.c1.s1.5.description1: You can arrange the crafting sequence in the ME Pattern Encoding Terminal
rod.c1.s1.6.description0: &aAE this early? Remember to automate soon~
rod.c1.s1.6.description2: &dMaybe as a shop? &cHow to check purchasable items?
rod.c1.s1.6.description3: &aSearch 'emc' in JEI to see items with EMC! [Only items showing &eLearned&r&a when shift-clicked can be bought~]
rod.c1.s1.6.description4: &aAlchemy books will be available every few chapters. Right-click to unlock more items
rod.c1.s1.7.title: Drawers
rod.c1.s2.title: More Perfect Matter Orbs?
rod.c1.s2.1.title: Molds
rod.c1.s2.2.title: Fluid Drawers
rod.c1.s2.4.description0: &a&mI remember notes mentioning an Infinite Mana Gem Block left in the base
rod.c1.s2.4.description1: &o&bSearch around the base to find it!
rod.c1.s2.5.description1: &bEmits different redstone signal levels based on mana amount
rod.c1.s2.6.subtitle: &c&o&lStore as much power as possible!!!
rod.c1.s2.6.description1: &aPower = (Heat Source Temp / 1000) * [(Coolant Temp Absolute + 1) / 2] * Base Power
rod.c1.s2.6.description3: For fluid heat sources, current temperature = source temp / (n + 1) where n is flow distance
rod.c1.s2.6.description4: &bCurrent Heat Source Temp = Fluid Source Heat / (n + 1)
rod.c1.s2.6.description6: &bIf coolant ratio [(Coolant Temp Absolute / 2) + 1] is <1, it defaults to 1
rod.c1.s2.6.description7: Source code screenshot on next page:
rod.c1.s2.7.title: Leaves
rod.c1.s2.8.title: Bonsai Pots
rod.c1.s2.9.description0: All vanilla burning methods are disabled. Check JEI for details
rod.c1.s2.10.title: &aPerfect Matter Orb!
rod.c1.s2.10.description0: &bNo-cost execution of Chromatic Orb recipes! Also used in other recipes
rod.c1.s2.11.description3: &bEnchant:&aIndestructible Sieve&r makes sieves never consume durability
rod.c2.title: Chapter 2
rod.c2.s1.title: Accompanied by Probability
rod.c2.s1.1.subtitle: &aWhat, this thing has chance in crafting?!
rod.c2.s1.2.subtitle: Crafting precision items always has some loss~
rod.c2.s1.3.subtitle: Crafting precision items always has some loss~
rod.c2.s1.4.title: Upgrade Foundation
rod.c2.s1.5.subtitle: &c&o&lPlease read this quest carefully!!!
rod.c2.s1.5.description2: &aBut actually, each time the recipe &bcompletes&a, it generates a block of liquid Sculk above it
rod.c2.s1.5.description3: &bNote: &dEcho Shards must be output, otherwise fluid won't generate
rod.c2.s1.6.title: Compacting Drawers
rod.c2.s1.6.description1: &aBecause Industrial Foregoing's Block Breaker drops both &9hand-mined&r and &9pickaxe-mined&r items for four basic blocks
rod.c2.s1.6.description2: Can drop items from &9bare hand&r mining
rod.c2.s1.7.title: Flux Networks
rod.c2.s1.8.description0: &cConsumes the block below - not a bug, but intentional
rod.c2.s1.8.description1: &aMaybe with components, it only consumes the block below once?
rod.c2.s1.10.title: &aTo The End
rod.c2.s1.10.description0: Use Mana-Infused Fiber Blocks to build the End Portal
rod.c2.s1.10.description1: Click the frame interior with Mana-Alloy to activate
rod.c2.s1.11.title: Ender Dragon Happy Trio
rod.c2.s1.12.description0: If the Ender Dragon moves around, you can temporarily control it
rod.c2.s1.12.description2: Hold &aBottle of Time&r in main hand and &aMana-Alloy&r in offhand, then right-click within &a10 blocks&r
rod.c2.s1.12.description3: Note: This is temporary. Use Mob Imprisonment Tool for automation
rod.c2.s1.12.description4: You can restore its AI by sneaking + right-click with Mana-Alloy
rod.c2.s2.title: Annoying Probability!
rod.c3.title: Chapter 3
rod.c3.s1.title: Strange Recipes
rod.c3.s1.1.title: <rainb><wave>Random Essence</wave></rainb>
rod.c3.s1.3.description1: &aCheck the &c1k ME Chemical Storage Cell&r recipe
rod.c3.s1.4.description0: &bNote: Don't use &4Bonsai Pots,&b use &aHopping Bonsai Pots
rod.c3.s1.4.description1: This recipe &4consumes&r the &b'soil'&r and &b'seed'&r in the pot
rod.c3.s1.4.description2: You can use &aSuper Factory Manager (SFM)&r for automation (code below):
rod.c3.s1.4.description3: &4If unable to input to pots, try relogging or restarting
